metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3563 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in openstack-keystone. Only the first 72 characters of an application secret are verified allowing attackers bypass some password complexity which administrators may be counting on. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to data confidentiality and integrity.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> no indication of possible fix from upstream as of 2023-01-03

criterions.comment: keystone: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was deferred').
